issue.title: DRCSIM: VRC1: Parking brake not on: car rolls when the robot tries to get in.

content.raw: Which version of the software are you using? To use the nightly builds or source builds from the default branch, the polaris model needs to be checked out from the gazebo_models repository. We are waiting until the end of qualification to update the model database.
content.html: Which version of the software are you using? To use the nightly builds or source builds from the default branch, the polaris model needs to be checked out from the gazebo_models repository. We are waiting until the end of qualification to update the model database.
